attributes.action: Not to penalize the majority of responsible drinkers because of the few and consider alternatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of penalizing the majority of responsible drinkers by adding to already very high taxes to target binge drinkers through their pockets.
To bring in breathe tests and on the spot fines for drinkers over a certain limit combined with acting in an anti-social manner.
Higher taxing would be unfair on the population while probably not solving the problem
